Field Detail

bottomrule

public static final String bottomrule
Requires LaTeX package booktabs. Produces a fancy line at the bottom of a table. This variable also includes the end{longtable} command and a new line.

CONSTANT_E

public static final String CONSTANT_E

CONSTANT_FALSE

public static final String CONSTANT_FALSE

CONSTANT_PI

public static final String CONSTANT_PI
The constant pi

See Also:
Constant Field Values

CONSTANT_TRUE

public static final String CONSTANT_TRUE

descriptionBegin

public static final String descriptionBegin
Surrounded by new line symbols. The begin of a description environment in LaTeX.

descriptionEnd

public static final String descriptionEnd
Surrounded by new line symbols. The end of a description environment.

eqBegin

public static final String eqBegin
Surrounded by new line symbols. Begin equation. This type of equation requires the LaTeX package breqn. It will produce equations with automatic line breaks (LaTeX will compute the optimal place for line breaks). Unfortunately, this does not work for very long denominators.

eqEnd

public static final String eqEnd
End equation; cf. eqBegin. Surrounded by new line symbols.

lineBreak

public static final String lineBreak
This is a LaTeX line break. The line break symbol double backslash followed by a new line symbol of the operating system.

midrule

public static final String midrule
Produces a fancy line in tables. Requires LaTeX package booktabs. Starts and ends with a new line.

NEGATIVE_ININITY

public static final String NEGATIVE_ININITY
See Also:

POSITIVE_INFINITY

public static final String POSITIVE_INFINITY

Constant Field Values

toprule

public static final String toprule
Needed for the beginning of a table. Requires LaTeX package booktabs. Surounded by new line symbols.

An opening quotation mark.

public static StringBuffer usepackage(String latexPackage,

Creates a usepackage command for the given package with the optional options.

Parameters:

options - options without commas

usepackage command including system-dependent new line character.

descriptionItem

public StringBuffer descriptionItem(String item,
                                    Object description)
This method simplifies the process of creating descriptions. There is an item entry together with a description. No new line or space is needed for separation.

Parameters:
item - e.g., "my item"
description - e.g., "my description"
Returns:

format

public StringBuffer format(double value)
This method returns a StringBuffer representing a properly LaTeX formatted number. However, if the double argument contains "Exx" (power of ten), then the returned value starts and ends with a dollar symbol.

Parameters:
value -
Returns:

href

public StringBuffer href(String target,
                         Object text)
Creates a hyper link to the given target and the text to be visible in the document.

Parameters:
target - The target to which this link points to.
text - The text to be written in the link.

longtableHead

public StringBuffer longtableHead(String columnDef,
                                  String caption,
                                  String headLine)
Creates a head for a longtable in LaTeX.

Parameters:
columnDef - without leading and ending brackets, e.g., "lrrc",
caption - caption of this table without leading and ending brackets
headLine - table head without leading and ending brackets and without double backslashes at the end
Returns:
